fields.summary: [Flight][Python] Flight client with TLS root certificate is reporting error on do_get()

comments.body: This is because client.py creates a new client to call do_get, but doesn't configure TLS certificates.
Thanks [~lidavidm], I have fixed this issue by assigning root certificate to newly created client and created PR: [https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6805].
